## askgpt image

Create an image from a prompt using the Dall-E model.

```
askgpt image [flags]
```

### Examples

```
askgpt image "A drawing of a cat."
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help       help for image
  -s, --size int   Size of the image to generate. Try 256, 512, 1024 (default 256)
```
